/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Trees line the street, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, adding to the serene ambiance of the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, captured in a moment of tranquility.
